subject: Speed Skating
Olympic Games
Accidents and Safety
Short Track Skating
lead_paragraph: No United States speedskater has competed on both the long- and short-track Olympic teams, but Ryan Leveille, who broke his back in 2004, wants to be the first.
snippet: No United States speedskater has competed on both the long- and short-track Olympic teams, but Ryan Leveille, who broke his back in 2004, wants to be the first.
